title: doesnt show dragons in replays
body:
ive been watching a few of my replays and i noticed that, unlike last year, it doesnt show team dragons under the scoreboard any more. is this a bug or intentional ? also if its intentional why ?

1. maybe dont show the soul and stuff but at least show the elementals that each team has
2. you can show souls, barons, elders in other ways
3. just bring back elemental icons under scoreboard pls

i might just have not found the button but yeah it seems as thought elemental drake counter is completely gone. thx
